channel.title: Sticky Notes on Quickly How Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Sticky Notes on Quickly How Tutorials

item.title: How to Open the Notes List in the Microsoft Sticky Notes App
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Open the Notes List: With Search With Hover With Right Click From a Sticky Note With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: View a video tutorial: How to Open the Notes List With Search Step 1: Go down to the taskbar and click Start (four blue squares). Step 2: In the Start menu that opens, click in the search bar at the top and type “sticky notes”.

item.title: How to Open a Sticky Note in the Microsoft Sticky Notes App
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Open a Sticky Note: With Double Click With Hover With Right Click From the Notes List No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: View a video tutorial: How to Open a Sticky Note with Double Click Step 1: First open the Sticky Notes app. In the Notes List window, double click a sticky note to open it. How to Open a Sticky Note With Hover Step 1: Open the Sticky Notes app.

item.title: How to Pin the Microsoft Sticky Notes App
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Pin the Sticky Notes App: To the Taskbar With Search To the Taskbar With Right Click To the Taskbar From Start To Start No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: Follow along with a tutorial video: How to Pin Sticky Notes to the Taskbar With Search Step 1: Go down to the taskbar and click Start (four blue squares). Step 2: In the Start window that opens, click the top search bar and type “sticky notes”.

item.title: How to Open the Microsoft Sticky Notes App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: What is the Microsoft Sticky Notes App? How to Open the Microsoft Sticky Notes App With Search No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: Watch a tutorial video here: What is the Microsoft Sticky Notes App? Sticky Notes is a note-taking app that comes with Windows 11. Notes can have formatted text (bold, italic, underline, strikethrough, and bulleted lists), images, and recognized URLs. For further customization, choose from seven different colors of sticky notes and a “Dark” mode for the app.

item.title: How to Undo and Redo in the Microsoft Sticky Notes App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Undo: With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Redo: With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Watch a tutorial video: How to Undo With Right Click Step 1: First edit a sticky note. Right click anywhere in the note. Step 2: In the menu that opens, click “Undo”. The previous action is reversed. How to Undo With Keyboard Shortcut Step 1: Edit a sticky note.
